description.displayText:
Grace was a lifesaver for me and my family.  She worked with us for 3 years and we now consider her to be a part of our family.  We hired her through care.com and have now known her close to 9 years now.  

Grace helped to drive my children to/from school/activities, helped me to doctors appointments (longtime injury) provided excellent companionship and peace in stressful situations.

She helped with everything around the house, shopping, entertaining children, driving, errands, food prep, homework, laundry, pet care, scheduling, and so much more.

I am very happy to speak with anyone that would like more information.
